question: Who will lead the Indian delegation in the 6th BRICS Parliamentary Forum 2020?
explanation:
Speakers and members of Parliaments of the five BRICS nations (Brazil, Russia, India, China and South Africa) would participate in the 6th BRICS Parliamentary Forum.
Indian Parliamentary delegation would be led by the Speaker of Lok Sabha, Om Birla. The Forum will be held in Virtual format. The meeting will be chaired by Vyachaslav Volodin, Chairman of the State Duma of the Federal Assembly of the Russian Federation.
